how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: I am Ada's Dad, she is just 8 months old. I'm building this stake pool for my daughter Ada, patiently waiting for the day that she could take over this pool and contributes to the Cardano ecosystem. I am an engineer by profession and tech savvy.
about.server: Cloud VM as it offeres better uptime, 4Core | 11.5GB RAM | 2x relays, 1x BP node, 1x Backup BP node

info.rss: http(s) url to valid RSS feed
